Abstract: The All of Us Data and Research Center aims to establish a robust, secure, and scalable data ecosystem to advance precision medicine. This initiative integrates diverse datasets, including electronic health records, genetic information, and environmental data, from a broad and inclusive participant base. The center prioritizes data privacy and security through advanced encryption and access control mechanisms, ensuring compliance with regulatory standards. By fostering data integration and interoperability, the center supports a wide range of biomedical research, facilitating discoveries that can lead to more personalized and effective healthcare solutions. The sustainable model of the All of Us Data and Research Center ensures long-term viability and continuous improvement, positioning it as a cornerstone of the precision medicine landscape.
